original_text: The sinners who live in Zion are afraid. The people who do not respect God shake with fear. They ask, ‘Who among us can stay alive? This is a fire that burns everything. Nobody can stop it from burning!’ The sinners who live in Zion are afraid. The people who do not respect God shake with fear. They ask, ‘Who among us can stay alive? This is a fire that burns everything. Nobody can stop it from burning!’ The sinners who live in Zion are afraid. The people who do not respect God shake with fear. They ask, ‘Who among us can stay alive? This is a fire that burns everything. Nobody can stop it from burning!’ The sinners who live in Zion are afraid.
korean_text: 시온의 죄인들이 두려워하며 경건하지 아니한 자들이 떨며 이르기를 우리 중에 누가 삼키는 불과 함께 거하겠으며 우리 중에 누가 영영히 타는 것과 함께 거하리요 하도다

sentences.original_text: The sinners who live in Zion are afraid.
The people who do not respect God shake with fear.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님을 존경하지 않는 사람들은 두려움에 떨고 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: This is a fire that burns everything.
Nobody can stop it from burning!'
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그것이 타는 것을 멈출 수 없습니다!'
